item.description: Site Name foot_print Purpose Profile display (Profile) Blog for organizing thoughts and keeping notes (Post List) Administrator mtsalt Content Focus Primarily web development-related topics (Category List, Tag List) Site Environment hugo + GitHub Pages (Environment Details) Launch Date May 1, 2024 Desclaimer We do not guarantee the accuracy or safety of the content Information may become outdated; please verify the latest updates We are not liable for any issues arising from the use of this site The views expressed are my own and do not reflect those of my affiliated organization
